title: Phase 1: Create types.py with core dataclasses
description:
Create types.py with:
- KernelSession
- NotebookHandle  
- CellInfo
- Task, TaskState
- TaskError
- All validation and batch evaluation types migrated from mathematica-mcp
close_reason: Created types.py with KernelSession, NotebookHandle, Task/TaskError, HealthStatus, and all batch/validation/graphics types. Verified import works.

title: Phase 1: Migrate hang prevention infrastructure
description:
Migrate critical hang prevention files:
- circuit_breaker.py (failure protection)
- health_monitor.py (background health checks)
- executors.py (dual executor pattern)
- frontend_worker.py (killable subprocesses)
close_reason: Migrated all hang prevention infrastructure: circuit_breaker.py, executors.py, health_monitor.py, frontend_worker.py. All imports verified.

title: Create unified server.py with all MCP tools
description:
Create main server.py that exposes all tools:
- kernel.* namespace
- notebook.* namespace
- eval.* namespace
- graphics.* namespace
- baseline.* namespace
- validation.* namespace
- task.* namespace
close_reason: Created unified server.py with all 32 MCP tools delegating to manager classes

title: Unified Mathematica MCP Server v2
description:
Consolidate mathematica-mcp and mathematica-gui-mcp into a single unified server with:
- Kernel lifecycle management with discovery
- Full notebook editing (open, read, edit, save, close)
- Batch evaluation with task-based monitoring
- Graphics export and visual comparison
- Baseline management and validation workflow
- 7-layer hang prevention architecture

See plans/unified-mathematica-mcp-server.md for full specification.
close_reason: All acceptance criteria verified - 16 files in src/mathematica_unified/ implementing 7-layer hang prevention architecture

title: Phase 1: Create unified project structure
description: Create pyproject.toml, src/mathematica_unified/ directory structure with __init__.py
close_reason: Created src/mathematica_unified/ directory with __init__.py, updated pyproject.toml to v2.0.0 with pyzmq dependency and dual entry points

title: Verify ReferencepH/μMaxpH cascade after re-evaluation
description: Code review shows the μMaxSolve→μMaxpH→ReferencepH→NDSolve chain is correct. The current  values are stale from previous evaluation. Re-evaluation after color fix should resolve.

title: Phase 5: Migrate validation workflow
description:
Migrate validation_manager.py:
- validation_start, validation_next, validation_status, validation_cancel
- End-to-end visual validation pipeline
close_reason: Completed Phase 5: Created validation_manager.py with 3-phase validation workflow

title: Phase 3: Migrate batch evaluation system
description:
Migrate batch_manager.py with:
- eval_cell (single cell evaluation)
- eval_batch_start, eval_batch_next, eval_batch_status, eval_batch_cancel
- Integration with notebook handles
close_reason: Created parsing.py and batch_manager.py. Batch manager enforces iterative evaluation with circuit breaker and health monitor integration. All operations go through FrontEndWorkerPool.

title: Phase 2: Create notebook_manager.py
description:
Create notebook lifecycle operations:
- notebook_open with locking
- notebook_list_cells, notebook_get_cell
- notebook_edit_cell, notebook_insert_cell, notebook_delete_cell
- notebook_save, notebook_close
- lock_manager.py for exclusive/shared locks
close_reason: Created lock_manager.py and notebook_manager.py with notebook open/close/list_cells/get_cell/edit_cell/insert_cell/delete_cell/save operations. All operations go through FrontEndWorkerPool for hang safety.

title: Fix s=Ks=. syntax bug causing s=Null
Fix missing txc and color scheme definitions in cell 6
description: txc was used but never defined. Added complete color scheme with txc defined first, plus missing bgc, bxc, fgc, glc, tkc definitions.
close_reason: False alarm - txc IS defined in v14_clean.nb at lines 60-61. Verified in dependency analysis.

title: Phase 1: Migrate kernel_manager.py with discovery
description:
Migrate kernel.py as kernel_manager.py with:
- kernel_start, kernel_stop
- kernel_discover (scan for running GUI kernels)
- kernel_quick_status (no kernel interaction)
- kernel_health (all subsystem status)
- kernel_force_reset (emergency kill)
close_reason: Created kernel_manager.py with start/stop, discovery, quick_status, get_health, force_reset, and evaluate. Integrates session_manager, executors, circuit_breaker, health_monitor, frontend_worker.

title: Phase 4: Migrate graphics pipeline
description:
Migrate graphics.py and baselines.py:
- graphics_list_cells, graphics_export_cell, graphics_export_all
- graphics_compare, graphics_compare_visual
- baseline_establish, baseline_confirm, baseline_import_dir, baseline_list
close_reason: Completed Phase 4: Created graphics_manager.py and baselines_manager.py with FrontEndWorkerPool integration

title: Phase 1: Create session and task managers
description:
Create:
- session_manager.py for kernel session tracking with persistence
- task_manager.py with task reaper for async operations
close_reason: Created session_manager.py (session tracking with persistence) and task_manager.py (async task management with Task Reaper Layer 7). All imports verified.

comments.author: albertgwo
comments.text: Traced dependency chain via subagent - all vars defined in order. Hypothesis: FindMaximum failing at line 1590 causes cascade. Waiting for user diagnostic.

comments.author: albertgwo
comments.text: ROOT CAUSE IDENTIFIED: NYield returns STRING 'YOutsideNiche' when pH outside bounds (lines 1747-1763). This breaks NDSolve. YieldpHLowBnd=3.91, YieldpHHighBnd=9.16 are defined correctly. pH=7 is within bounds. Investigating why NDSolve still fails - may be pattern matching issue during numerical evaluation. Waiting for deep diagnostic output.

comments.author: albertgwo
comments.text: Deep diagnostic results: All values numeric and valid. Simple NDSolve works. Full coupled ODE system with EventLocator works in isolation. Issue is specific to timeGrowthCease function - possibly global variable shadowing with Module locals (s, time, MRef, M) or multiple conflicting definitions. Awaiting shadowing check results.

comments.author: albertgwo
comments.text: Root cause #2 identified and fixed: timeGrowthCease had stale cached definition. Clear + redefine returned 2.1721 instead of $Failed. User needs to run Evaluate All Cells for full notebook re-evaluation.
